docna.cdata!:
Lao - Structural Adjustment Credit : Credit
            2037 - Credit Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Lao - Structural Adjustment
            Credit : Credit 2037 - Credit Agreement - Conformed

18150166.admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific

abstracts.cdata!:
The objectives of the First Structural
            Adjustment Credit are to support the substantial reforms
            undertaken by the Government and to underpin the
            Government's implementation efforts over the 1989-91
            period. Specifically, the credit will: (i) assist the Lao
            PDR to improve state enterprise management; (ii) stimulate
            private sector activities; (iii) assist with formulation of
            fiscal measures to ensure increased revenues; (iv) assist
            with Bank reform measures aimed at an increase in savings
            mobilization; and (v) support measures to achieve greater
            efficiency in the use of resources. The objectives are to be
            achieved in part through support to the balance of payments
            by the First Structural Adjustment Credit, partly by support
            to the budget provided by the counterpart funds generated by
            the sale of imports purchased under the credit and, partly
            through ongoing dialogue on policy issues.
